name: TeSlime
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game jam.

You are a battery which has to protect its tesla from angry slimes coming its way. You can zap the slimes if the tesla has enough energy. To charge the tesla and to zap the slimes you and the tesla have to be joined together.  Once a slime dies it will drom a little energy pick up you can restore your energy bar with.  The more energy you have the faster you move!

To zap the slimes use the left mouse button and to move you can use wasd or the arrow keys.

Credits: Plaette by Polyducks - https://lospec.com/palette-list/ayy4

Also a special thanks to GDQuest for helping me along the way!
